mapper.select: SELECT s.id, r.id resourcesRelId, type, mark, target, r.join_num joinNum, r.reach_num reachNum FROM star_resources_rel r LEFT JOIN resources s ON r.resources_id = s.id WHERE r.star_id =#{starId} AND s.begin_time <= #{nowTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.end_time >= #{nowTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
